description: I was chilling out and looking for a nice catch when I saw this guy. He was easy to spot. A tall and huge boy. And I mean huge! I used my blog about athletes excuse on him and he swallowed the bait easily. He definitely wanted to show off. So I took him to a nearby work out place and paid him to exercise for my amusement. Half-naked, of course. The boy was a bodybuilder hence the view was simply gorgeous. All those pull-ups made me terribly horny. I just didn´t want to make him angry with some inappropriate proposition. Then he told me about his financial problems and I offered him a nice way to solve them. I was lucky because the guy was very open-minded, I think he even had a gay experience. Or maybe he liked me, who knows.
title: Czech Hunter 301
